content: I cannot predict future events or trends with certainty. however, it is safe to say that the use of robotic systems in construction is steadily increasing. as technology advances, costs decrease, and the benefits of robotics become more apparent, it is likely that more construction companies will start using robotic systems soon. some construction companies have already adopted robotic systems in their processes, and their success will likely inspire others to follow suit. however, the decision to adopt new technology depends on factors such as cost, return on investment, and the specific needs of each construction company.
